summary: Army modernization includes updating existing weapons and acquiring new weapons to give the Army an edge over its adversaries. This testimony discusses 3 prior reports assessing the Army's near- and long-term modernization efforts, related budget documents, and acquisition processes for major weapon systems. title: Army Modernization: Army Should Take Steps to Reduce Risk
